translation.en: [Agatha] Undead.
Tell me.
There is a contagion,
a corruption passing through this world from one sufferer to the next.
translation.ja: それに感染してしまった人は

translation.en: For those unfortunates who fall victim to it, life becomes incurable.
translation.ja: 生きることが不治の病となる

translation.en: They lose the divine ability to die.
translation.ja: 命の終わりという救いを失う

translation.en: As their bodies rot, their consciousness persists.
translation.ja: 体が朽ちても意識は残る

translation.en: Even as dust, their pain goes on.
translation.ja: 灰になっても苦痛が続く

translation.en: It is a secret every gravedigger keeps.
translation.ja: 墓掘り人が口をつぐむ禁忌

translation.en: There are those among us  destined to scratch at our coffin lids for all eternity.
translation.ja: 棺(ひつぎ)の蓋を永遠にひっかく死者がいる

translation.en: If you work among the dead, it's not death you fear,
translation.ja: もはや恐ろしいのは死ではない

translation.en: it's the alternative.
Is there any salvation for such creatures?
translation.ja: 不死者に救いはあるのか？

translation.en: -[Agatha] I don't know. -Have faith!
translation.ja: 分からない 信仰よ

translation.en: Faith is a sleeping draught for children and simpletons.
translation.ja: 信仰は眠り薬に過ぎない

translation.en: What we must have...
is a plan.
[Harker] Dracula's one of them, isn't he?
translation.ja: 伯爵も そうなのか？

translation.en: Undead?
Undead, certainly, but from your account, I think he's much more complicated.
translation.ja: ええでも それだけとは思えない

translation.en: [Dracula] Johnny, there you are.
translation.ja: ジョニー 捜したよ

translation.en: I thought we'd lost you.
[groans] What am I doing here?
Well, I found you downstairs, asleep on the floor.
translation.ja: 君は地下室の床で寝てたよ

translation.en: I could be wrong, but I think you were having a nightmare.
translation.ja: 悪夢を見てたようだね

translation.en: You do look rather pale.
You said you didn't drink.
Wine. Now... [clears throat] ...listen,
translation.ja: ワインはね 聞いてくれ

translation.en: I need you to do something.
Now, sit yourself down. There you go. That's the ticket.
translation.ja: ほら 座って それでいい

translation.en: Now, take this.
I need you to write three letters.
What was that?
-That's nothing. -It sounded like a baby.
[chuckles] No, no, no. There's no baby. Now, Johnny, concentrate. Three letters.
translation.ja: 赤ん坊など いないよジョニー 集中して

translation.en: No one calls me Johnny.
translation.ja: 誰も そう呼ばない

translation.en: No one?
No one.
Company for you while you work.
Who is she?
Don't you recognize her?
Why would I?
I took it from your room. It's Mina, your fiancée.
translation.ja: 君の部屋にあった婚約者の写真だ

translation.en: Mina Murray.
How...
How can I not recognize her face?
Well, you do look rather...
drained.
You look young.
And I owe it all to you.
translation.ja: 全部 君のおかげだ

translation.en: Thanks.
Now, it's almost time for you to go, so three letters, all to Mina.
translation.ja: 君もそろそろ帰る頃だミーナに手紙を書こう

translation.en: The first saying you have nearly finished your work here and will be leaving within the week.
translation.ja: １通目は“１週間以内に帰路につく”と

translation.en: The second saying that you have now completed your work and will be leaving the following day.
translation.ja: ２通目は“仕事が終わった明日 城を出る”

translation.en: And the third saying you have now left the castle and have arrived safely in--
What shall we say?
Bistritz, hmm?
I will send the letters at the appropriate times.
translation.ja: 時期が来たら私が送る

translation.en: I'll forward the last one to Bistritz, so it can be sent from there.
translation.ja: ３通目はビストリツァからね

translation.en: But why-- Why would I do that?
translation.ja: 一体 何のために書く？

translation.en: So that Mina will know that you're coming home.
But why would I write the letters in advance?
translation.ja: なぜ事前に書く必要が？

translation.en: Because the post here is very erratic. It's a precaution.
translation.ja: 配達が信用できないから念のためだ

translation.en: For whom? If...
If something were to happen to me, and those letters had already been sent--
translation.ja: もし帰れなくて手紙だけ届けば…

translation.en: Then Mina wouldn't think to come looking for you here.
translation.ja: ミーナは君を捜しにここには来ないだろう

translation.en: Do you want her to come here?
translation.ja: それとも 来てほしい？

translation.en: That's a baby.
-I can hear it crying. -There is no baby.
translation.ja: 泣いている 赤ん坊など いない

translation.en: Write the letters or don't write the letters.
translation.ja: 手紙を書くのか書かないのか？

translation.en: It's up to you. I'm only thinking about Mina.
translation.ja: ミーナのために なるのは？

translation.en: Now, if you don't mind, things to do. See you tomorrow evening. Leave the letters on the table.
translation.ja: 私は忙しい手紙は机に用意しておいて

translation.en: The dates!
The dates for the letters.
How should I date them?
Well, let's see.
The 12th for the first. Uh, for the second, the 19th.
And for the third...
What shall we say? 29th?
29th?
As good a day as any, Johnny.
translation.ja: それくらいで いい

translation.en: Good night.
What if I leave? What if I leave this place right now?
translation.ja: もし僕が今すぐここを出たら？

translation.en: No one is stopping you.
I don't have the strength.
[Dracula] No, I know.
It's not your fault, Johnny. You mustn't blame yourself.
translation.ja: 君のせいではない気に病むな

translation.en: [Harker] Please.
Please!
Leave the baby.
Johnny, there is no baby.
translation.ja: ジョニー 赤ん坊など いないよ

translation.en: [Harker] I knew in that moment that I had a choice.
translation.ja: 僕には２つの道があった

translation.en: I had been told the span of my life, the limit of my existence: the 29th.
translation.ja: 29日までの命だと宣告された

translation.en: Now, I could stay here dying piece by piece
translation.ja: ここで死ぬまで弱りきり

translation.en: till I found myself nailed into one of those boxes.
translation.ja: 棺に納まる遺体の１つとなるか

translation.en: Or?
Or I could kill Count Dracula.
translation.ja: ドラキュラ伯爵を殺すかだ

translation.en: Not an easy task in the circumstances.
translation.ja: 簡単なことではないはず

translation.en: No, but I had certain advantages.
translation.ja: だが僕に有利な点もあった

translation.en: I should be fascinated to know what they were.
translation.ja: それは ぜひ知りたいわ

translation.en: I was enfeebled and trapped.
-Well, indeed. -So, Dracula did not consider me a threat.
translation.ja: 本当にね 伯爵は僕を侮っていた

translation.en: [Agatha] That's true, yes.
But on the negative side, you were enfeebled and trapped.
translation.ja: でも実際に弱ってたでしょ

translation.en: I had a potential ally, one who could climb the castle walls.
translation.ja: 味方もできそうだった城の壁を登れる人だ

translation.en: One you couldn't even find.
That was because I was looking for the wrong thing.
translation.ja: 捜し方を間違えてたからだ

translation.en: I should've been looking for a map.
translation.ja: 設計図を捜すべきだった

translation.en: Of the castle? But there wasn't one.
That's what Dracula believed. But in telling me that, he'd also told me where to find it.
translation.ja: 伯爵はそう思ってたが無意識にありかを口にした

translation.en: What did he say?
I told you.
I missed it.
You did.
Then you're much quicker than me.
I'm not quick. I've always been slow.
But the thing is, when you're slow, you know you need to pay attention.
translation.ja: 鈍いからこそ注意深い

translation.en: It's the clever ones who never listen.
translation.ja: 賢い奴は話を聞かない

translation.en: You've read all this already in my account.
translation.ja: 僕の滞在記の中に書いてある

translation.en: [inhales] It's vague in certain crucial regards.
translation.ja: 曖昧な点も多かったから

translation.en: Continue, please.
[Harker] It occurred to me that night that Dracula said more than he intended.
translation.ja: 伯爵は彼自身も知らない真実を漏らした

translation.en: And more than he knew.
As he was a creature of the night, I had to wait until morning to test my theory.
translation.ja: 伯爵は夜しか行動しない僕は朝を待った

translation.en: The Count said there was no map, but Petruvio was an artist,
translation.ja: 城を設計したペトロビオは芸術家だ

translation.en: and artists always wish to be understood.
translation.ja: 芸術家は意匠を理解させたがる

translation.en: The castle was a monument to the architect's lost love
translation.ja: 城は失った妻と日光への思慕を―

translation.en: and the sunlight to which he would never return.
And what else is sunlight,
but the face of one's beloved?
translation.ja: 愛する者の姿に他ならない

translation.en: The path to the sunlight.
It was clear from the castle maps
translation.ja: 設計図を見れば明らかだった

translation.en: that Petruvio had created, within his design,
translation.ja: 設計図を見れば明らかだった 建築士は迷宮に抜け道を作った

translation.en: a system of shortcuts through the maze.
translation.ja: 建築士は迷宮に抜け道を作った

translation.en: Hidden passages, possibly unknown even to Dracula himself.
translation.ja: 伯爵すら知らない近道かもしれない

translation.en: How many times had I looked at that picture and not seen it?
translation.ja: ようやく僕は気付いた

translation.en: Petruvio's wife was the sunlight,
and he stood guard at the door.
He doesn't know I can get out of the box. Don't tell him.
translation.ja: 私が棺から出られると伯爵には言わないで

translation.en: I won't.
Are you his friend now?
[stammering] No, I work for him.
translation.ja: 違う　僕は彼に雇われてる

translation.en: I'm a lawyer from England.
I think he's made you his friend.
translation.ja: もう友達にされてるわ

translation.en: Why?
What's England?
It's where I'm from.
You know it. You're speaking English.
translation.ja: 知ってるだろ君は英語を話してる

translation.en: I learned it.
-How? -It tasted funny.
translation.ja: 誰に？ 変な味だった

translation.en: Tasted?
Once you are the Count's friend, all languages are the same.
translation.ja: 伯爵の友達になればどの言語も別の味

translation.en: I'm hungry.
Was it you at the window?
You left the message?
I smelled you.
You're trapped here.
You're trapped too.
I want to help you.
[woman] Tell him I'm hungry.
He only gives me scraps.
translation.ja: 残り物しか くれないの

translation.en: Tiny little things.
Tell him I finished the last one.
I finished it really quickly.
-[shouts] I'm hungry! -[gasps]
Look at it!
It is the sign of the cross.
The symbol of our Lord.
I know.
It's pretty.
You assumed, I suppose, that the cross would ward off evil.
translation.ja: 十字架が悪を追い払うと信じてたのね

translation.en: Why are you smiling?
Your faith, I think it's touching.
translation.ja: 信心深さに感心したからよ

translation.en: What happened to yours?
I have looked for God everywhere in this world and never found him.
translation.ja: 探したけど神に会えなかったから

translation.en: Then why are you here?
Well, like many women of my age, I am trapped in a loveless marriage, maintaining appearances for the sake of a roof over my head.
translation.ja: 愛がなくても生活のために結婚するのと同じ理屈よ

translation.en: Now then,
we proceed to your miraculous escape from Castle Dracula
translation.ja: 奇跡の脱出方法を聞きたい

translation.en: about which you have been so vague.
translation.ja: 記述が曖昧で不明だから

translation.en: [Harker breathlessly] Somebody?
Please, help!
[Dracula] Johnny, this is interesting.
I've never seen it work with a baby before. Never.
translation.ja: 赤ん坊で成功したのは初めてだ

translation.en: I think I might keep it on for a while.
I hope this doesn't mean that I'm getting sentimental.
translation.ja: 情に流されてるとは思いたくないが

translation.en: -[breathlessly] Why did you kill her? -[Dracula] Who?
because I wanted to see if she would die, I suppose.
translation.ja: 死ぬかどうか確認したくて

translation.en: Johnny, don't give me that look. You were a child once. You know the feeling.
translation.ja: 君も幼い頃は仕組みを理解したくて―

translation.en: Didn't you break your toys apart to see how they worked?
translation.ja: オモチャを分解しただろ？

translation.en: You are a monster.
And you are a lawyer. Nobody's perfect.
translation.ja: 君は弁護士　誰もが不完全だ

translation.en: A stake through the heart. You see, sometimes the legends are right.
translation.ja: 心臓に杭(くい)を打つと死ぬ伝承も たまには正しいな

translation.en: This is not one you can test too often, though.
translation.ja: だが検証は何度もできない

translation.en: I only ever have three brides at a time.
Brides?
Brides, yes. I think that's the right word for it.
translation.ja: ああ そう呼んでいる

translation.en: You see, um... [clears throat] I am trying to reproduce.
translation.ja: 私は繁殖したくていろいろ試してる

translation.en: Which, frankly, can be a bit of a challenge when there is only one of you.
translation.ja: 一人では困難な課題だがね

translation.en: Ah, Johnny, you're just about done, aren't you?
translation.ja: ジョニー 死にそうだね

translation.en: She was a thirsty little thing, and to think that she was going to keep you in that box all to herself.
translation.ja: 彼女は君を独り占めしようと箱にしまったんだね

translation.en: Are you going to kill me?
Of course I'm going to kill you.
translation.ja: もちろん 私が殺す

translation.en: Why does death always come as such a shock to mortals?
translation.ja: なぜ定命の者は死を恐れるんだろうね

translation.en: [Harker] You took everything from me.
[Dracula] Well, of course I did.
You are the high road that leads me to England.
translation.ja: 君は英国へ渡るための手段だから

translation.en: Why England?
The people. All those sophisticated and intelligent people.
translation.ja: 英国人は洗練されていて頭がいいからだ

translation.en: As I've been trying to tell everyone for centuries, you are what you eat.
translation.ja: よく言うだろ？“食べる物があなたを作る”

translation.en: [Dracula] Now...
if you don't mind, I need you to do one last thing for me.
translation.ja: 最後に一つしてほしいことがある

translation.en: I haven't seen her in hundreds of years.
translation.ja: 彼女を数百年 見てない

translation.en: Describe her to me.
[breathlessly] Who?
I've had artists paint her and poets capture her in words,
translation.ja: 画家に絵を描かせ詩人に詩を作らせた

translation.en: and Mozart wrote such a pretty little tune, I...
translation.ja: モーツァルトには彼女に曲を捧げさせたよ

translation.en: [clears throat] I really should have spared him, but...
translation.ja: 彼を食べて後悔してる

translation.en: What does a lawyer see?
Johnny, in my memory,
translation.ja: この時期 彼女は山頂の後ろにいて―

translation.en: she sits behind the second highest peak at this time of year,
translation.ja: この時期 彼女は山頂の後ろにいて― 真っ赤だと記憶してる

translation.en: and she's quite red.
translation.ja: 真っ赤だと記憶してる

translation.en: Is she red, Johnny?
Look for yourself.
But that will burn me to dust.
Good.
Fair enough.
Absolutely fair enough.
Will you put me in a box?
[Dracula] Keep your eyes on the sun, Johnny.
translation.ja: 太陽を目に焼きつけろ

translation.en: It'll be the last time you see her.
translation.ja: もう二度と見られない

translation.en: There is a box waiting for you in case you walk, yes.
translation.ja: 私が食べたあとも動くなら入れる

translation.en: But most people I feed off just die, so you'll probably be fine.
translation.ja: だが大半はそのまま死ぬから大丈夫

translation.en: Don't you see? An end is a blessing.
Dying gives you size.
It's the mountaintop from which your whole life is at last visible,
translation.ja: 君の人生を見渡せる唯一の頂上だ

translation.en: from beginning to end.
Death completes you.
Spare me.
How?
Answer me. Johnny, how?
translation.ja: ジョニー 教えてくれ

translation.en: How do I spare you?
How indeed, Mr. Harker?
Mr. Harker.
Mr. Harker, you were about to explain how you escaped from the castle.
translation.ja: ハーカーさんどう城から脱出したの？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.ja: 滞在記は読んだんだろ？

translation.en: -You've read my account. -Yes.
translation.ja: 滞在記は読んだんだろ？ ええ

translation.en: Perhaps it will help to refresh your memory.
translation.ja: 自分でも読み返してみて

translation.en: [Harker] "Dracula will be served."
translation.ja: 〝伯爵はよみがえる〞 “伯爵は奉仕される”？

translation.en: What is this?
"Dracula is my master. Dracula will be obeyed. Drac--
translation.ja: “伯爵は僕の主人伯爵に服従する”？

translation.en: Dracula is the beginning and the end. Dracula is all things. Dracula is God."
translation.ja: “伯爵は万物を司(つかさど)る伯爵は神である”？

translation.en: What?
I didn't write this.
When you were first brought here, you asked for a pen and paper.
translation.ja: 初日に あなたは紙とペンを要求し―

translation.en: You were up all day and all night, and this is what you wrote.
translation.ja: 夜通し これを書いた

translation.en: No. No, I thought I'd--
translation.ja: 違う　僕が書いたのは…

translation.en: [Agatha] You thought you'd written an account of your stay at Castle Dracula.
translation.ja: 滞在記を書いたと言ってたけど

translation.en: The only account you've given is the account you are giving right now.
translation.ja: 実際に書いたのはその文章だけ

translation.en: It's time to finish your story.
[Dracula] Johnny, how?
How do I spare you?
How?
[Harker] Let me go.
You know why I'm going to England. You know that I'm going to kill people.
translation.ja: 私が英国へ行って殺戮(さつりく)する気だと―

translation.en: A lot of them. As many as I need, and perhaps even more.
I... [gagging]
-[choking] I won't. -You won't what?
Oh, you won't tell anyone about me, or try to stop me?
translation.ja: 誰にも言わず邪魔しないと？

translation.en: You'll just let me slaughter all those innocents, no questions asked? [laughs]
translation.ja: 私が虐殺するのをただ見てると？

translation.en: Some lawyer you turned out to be, Johnny.
translation.ja: なんと立派な弁護士だろう

translation.en: [breathlessly] I promise.
[sobbing] I swear.
translation.ja: 僕は誓う 誓いを立てるから 誓うから お願いだ

translation.en: All right, then.
Do that.
[Dracula] Swear.
I'm going to England to destroy everything and everyone you love,
translation.ja: 君の愛する者を皆殺しにする

translation.en: but if you give me your word that you won't try to stop me,
translation.ja: それを止めないと誓うなら―

translation.en: I'll spare you.
-[softly] It's a trick. -Give me your word.
translation.ja: これは罠(わな)だ 誓うがいい

translation.en: [cries] No, you're going to kill me anyway.
translation.ja: 誓っても僕を殺すだろ

translation.en: [Dracula] Look me in the eye... and give me your word.
translation.ja: 私の目を見て 誓いを立てよ

translation.en: Count Dracula,
I give you my word.
If you let me out of this place...
[shakily] if you let me live,
then I...
then I will do everything in my power to stop you.
translation.ja: 何としてでもお前を阻止すると誓う

translation.en: Quite right.
That's my Johnny. [chuckles]
Welcome to the mountaintop.
I'm not breathing.
Sometimes you do, but I think it's mostly habit.
translation.ja: たまに癖でしてるけど

translation.en: You have no heartbeat either.
I'm dead.
Undead,
but apparently not yet a vampire.
One must cling on to any good news that there is.
translation.ja: いいことに目を向けて

translation.en: I do not serve Dracula.
No, but he's in your mind.
The question is, why are you not in one of his boxes?
translation.ja: なぜ棺の中にいないの？

translation.en: I don't know.
[Agatha] It's not something one ever anticipates asking, but what happened after you were murdered?
translation.ja: 妙な質問だけど殺されて どうなったの？

translation.en: Oh, my goodness, that was quick.
translation.ja: これは驚いたよ 随分 早いな

translation.en: Johnny. Usually people have a lie-down first.
translation.ja: ジョニー普通は一旦 休むものだよ

translation.en: You're going to be a lively one, aren't you?
translation.ja: 生きのいい不死者になるね

translation.en: You came back so quickly, that was impressive.
translation.ja: 生き返るのが とても早い

translation.en: You even have the beginnings of a will of your own.
translation.ja: 意思すら持ち始めてる

translation.en: None of the others had much beyond hunger, but look at you go!
translation.ja: 食欲に支配されないのは君が初めてだ

translation.en: Well, don't you see? This changes everything.
translation.ja: これは進歩だよすべてが変わる

translation.en: Stay.
You could be my finest bride.
translation.ja: 君は最高の花嫁になる

translation.en: The others just became beasts, but you've kept your spirit.
translation.ja: 怪物にならず精神を保ったのは君だけ

translation.en: Johnny, you're like me.
I am not like you.
translation.ja: 僕は あなたとは違う

translation.en: That's everything. That's...
It's all I remember.
But why did he scream? What did you do?
Nothing. I did nothing. I...
I looked at him, and the next thing I remember was that I was here.
translation.ja: 次に気付いた時にはここにいた

translation.en: Yes, never mind that.
-We know what happened next. -[Harker] No, I...
translation.ja: それは知ってる 僕は―

translation.en: I don't... I don't remember.
translation.ja: ここに どう来たか知らない

translation.en: The river bore you out to sea, and a fisherman found you, caught in their net.
translation.ja: 川から海へ流され漁師に発見された

translation.en: A drowned man walking and talking arouses a certain amount of curiosity,
translation.ja: 話せる溺死体は注目を集めすぎたから

translation.en: and you were brought to me,
babbling of a girl called Mina whose face you had forgotten and an evil Count who had stolen your soul.
translation.ja: 婚約者と邪悪な伯爵の名を溺死体は呼び続けた

translation.en: Why was I brought to you?
I am known to have some expertise in the realm of witchcraft and the occult.
translation.ja: 魔術やオカルトの専門知識があるから

translation.en: You're a nun.
We can discuss my imperfectly suppressed fascination with everything dark and evil another time.
translation.ja: 闇と悪への私の執着の話は今はしなくていい

translation.en: For now, we will focus on why Dracula screamed.
translation.ja: なぜ伯爵が叫んだのか考えて

translation.en: You were facing the sun.
Yes.
I have sought to find God all my life and never found a sign of him anywhere.
translation.ja: ずっと神を探してたけど見つからなかった

translation.en: Why now? Why you? Why him?
translation.ja: なぜ今 見つかるの？

translation.en: -I don't understand. -Then think!
[Agatha] Count Dracula fears the cross.
translation.ja: 伯爵は十字架を恐れる

translation.en: He fears the symbol of our Lord.
-The girl didn't. -Never mind the girl. She was nothing.
translation.ja: 彼女は… あの子は下級だから

translation.en: Dracula, prince among vampires, fears the cross.
translation.ja: 吸血鬼の頂点たる伯爵は十字架を恐れる

translation.en: Do you understand what that means?
No, tell me.
God is real.
God is real, and I've found him at last.
translation.ja: 神は実在するついに見つけた

translation.en: [Harker] You have found the Devil.
If it takes the Devil to bring me to my Lord, then I say bring on the Devil!
translation.ja: 神に会うためなら魔王にも感謝する

translation.en: -I don't! -[Agatha] And why not?
translation.ja: 僕は しない なぜなの？

translation.en: God saved you for a reason, don't you think?
translation.ja: あなたは神に救われた

translation.en: I'm not saved.
I'm nothing.
Would Mina think that?
translation.ja: ミーナも そう思う？

translation.en: If she could see me, yes, she would.
Look at me.
I can't even remember her face.
Yes, I think you have proven that to our satisfaction.
translation.ja: ええ それは間違いない

translation.en: [Agatha] Mr. Harker, I apologize for the deception.
translation.ja: 隠していて ごめんなさい

translation.en: It was necessary she heard the story from your own lips.
translation.ja: 彼女に真実を聞かせるためよ

translation.en: You may have forgotten your fiancée's face,
translation.ja: たとえ顔を忘れていても…

translation.en: but I have not lost you yet.
translation.ja: あなたは ここにいる

translation.en: Hello, Johnny.
Your eyes are still blue, at least.
translation.ja: 目の色は変わってないわ

translation.en: [Agatha] Having established your identity, it was not difficult to trace you back to England and find your worried fiancée.
translation.ja: 名前が分かれば婚約者を捜すのも簡単よ

translation.en: I have a detective acquaintance in London.
Mina.
[Mina] Did you really think,
even in your darkest moment,
translation.ja: どんな闇の中だろうと―

translation.en: that I wouldn't come for you?
Did you think it was even possible that I could abandon the man I love?
translation.ja: 私が愛する人を見捨てるなどありえると思う？

translation.en: I am no longer that man.
translation.ja: 僕は もう人ではない

translation.en: Dearest one,
we are to be married.
And so let me be plain,
who you are will always be my decision.
translation.ja: あなたが何者かは私が決める

translation.en: Dracula is here.
How exciting.
Look after Mina.
[Harker] Mina.
Take it, please.
[Mina] Why?
[Harker] Because you're bleeding.
And I can't stand it.
Take it!
Mother Superior, on no account invite that creature in.
translation.ja: 修道院長絶対に魔物を招かないで

translation.en: That is not a temptation with which I was struggling.
translation.ja: 招く気は一切 ない

translation.en: What is happening? What is this?
We are under attack from the forces of darkness.
translation.ja: 闇の軍勢に襲われてる

translation.en: Why would the forces of darkness wish to attack a convent?
translation.ja: なぜ女子修道院を襲うの？

translation.en: Perhaps they are sensitive to criticism.
translation.ja: 批判されて立腹なのかも

translation.en: I know who you are.
I've studied the legends.
I am fully aware that I am addressing Count Dracula.
translation.ja: あなたがドラキュラ伯爵だと確信してる

translation.en: The bats are a little noisy. Would you mind?
translation.ja: 少しコウモリを黙らせて

translation.en: Listen to me.
You are Jonathan Harker.
translation.ja: あなたはジョナサン･ハーカー

translation.en: You would never harm me.
translation.ja: 私を決して傷つけない

translation.en: I know I am safe with you.
translation.ja: あなたといれば私に危険などない

translation.en: [Mina] It's me.
Look at me.
See me.
My blue-eyed Johnny.
translation.ja: 私の青い目のジョニー

translation.en: No, Johnny.
Don't.
Oh, please, don't.
You don't need to do that.
I know you don't!
[screaming] Johnny!
The sun is down. You don't need to hide anymore.
translation.ja: 日は落ちてる　出てきたら？

translation.en: Or are you too afraid to step from the shadows?
Please.
Let me.
-Johnny. -[Harker] Let me.
-Please. -[Mina cries] Johnny.
No.
I'm sorry.
-Somebody help! Please! -[metal clangs]
This is devilry.
[Agatha] It's worse than that.
It is the Devil.
I don't know about you girls,
but I do love a bit of fur.
Suffer unto me.
I'm not sure what legends you've been reading, but bells don't have any effect on me.
translation.ja: 何の伝承を学んだんだ？鐘を鳴らしても無意味だ

translation.en: This one will.
Sister Agatha, have you been up to one of your secret projects again?
translation.ja: また あなたの妙な研究のせい？

translation.en: You'd better hope so.
[Dracula] This is exciting. This'll be the most nuns I've had in one sitting.
translation.ja: 一度にこんなに多くの修道女を見られるとはね

translation.en: Sisters, present arms.
translation.ja: 総員 武器を構えて

translation.en: I see my arrival was anticipated.
I was aware of the possibility.
Sister Agatha, what have you brought down upon us?
translation.ja: また あなたのせい？

translation.en: Cooee!
Hello!
Hello, ladies!
I don't want to worry you, but the army of the faithful can't seem to look me in the eye.
translation.ja: 勇ましく構えても私の目も見られないか？

translation.en: You're naked, and they're nuns. It isn't your eye they're not looking at.
translation.ja: 直視できないのは別のモノよ

translation.en: [Dracula] Well, isn't anyone going to invite me in? I've come a long way to see you.
translation.ja: 遠路はるばる来たんだぞ誰か招き入れてくれ

translation.en: Certainly not.
Sister Rosa, the key.
translation.ja: シスター･ローザ 鍵を

translation.en: [whispers] You can't be serious.
I am more than serious. I'm completely confident.
[Dracula] How did you know that I was coming?
[Agatha] There's a man here you consider to be your property.
translation.ja: ある男性が ここにいる

translation.en: -My bride. -He is what drew you here, I think.
translation.ja: 私の花嫁だ 彼を求めて来たのね

translation.en: A bee can always find nectar.
translation.ja: 蜂は蜜を見つけるものだ

translation.en: And a trap always needs honey.
translation.ja: そして罠は蜜を使うもの

translation.en: I don't think this is a trap.
Well, it wouldn't be a very good trap if you did.
translation.ja: いい罠は気付かれないものよ

translation.en: Thank you, Sister.
Count Dracula, please attend my words with care.
translation.ja: 私の言葉をよく聞いて

translation.en: This is Saint Mary's Convent of Budapest, and you're not welcome here.
translation.ja: 聖マリア修道院はあなたを歓迎しない

translation.en: You are most specifically not invited in.
translation.ja: 誰も あなたを招き入れない

translation.en: So, it's true, then.
translation.ja: 本当なのね　面白い

translation.en: -That's interesting. -[Mother Superior] What is?
translation.ja: 本当なのね　面白い 何が？

translation.en: [Agatha] A vampire may not enter any abode unless invited in. I wasn't sure about that one.
translation.ja: 吸血鬼は招かれない家に入れないという伝承です

translation.en: -A vampire? -You unlocked the gate
translation.ja: 吸血鬼？ 確信もなく開門したのか？

translation.en: and you weren't sure?
translation.ja: 確信もなく開門したのか？

translation.en: -A vampire? -Oh, the iron wasn't keeping you out.
translation.ja: 吸血鬼？ そもそも門なんてねじ切れるでしょ

translation.en: You could have torn it apart like matchwood.
translation.ja: そもそも門なんてねじ切れるでしょ

translation.en: I could tear you apart.
translation.ja: 君も ねじ切ろうか？

translation.en: Not from out there, you couldn't.
But what's stopping you?
A feeling? A force? Is it physical or mental?
translation.ja: 気持ちの問題なの？それとも物理的な強制力？

translation.en: -Why do you need an invitation? -Do you expect me to tell you?
translation.ja: 気持ちの問題なの？それとも物理的な強制力？ 答えると思う？

translation.en: Oh, I don't even expect you to know.
A beast can follow rules. I don't expect it to understand them.
translation.ja: 怪物は自らの定めに従うのみ

translation.en: I am more than a beast.
In what way?
But by your own account, you've been on this earth for hundreds of years, and you can't even walk into a nunnery?
translation.ja: 数百年も生きてて修道院に侵入もできないの？

translation.en: An ox could do it.
translation.ja: 牛でも入れるどこが怪物より上等？

translation.en: -How are you more than a beast? -You want me to show you?
translation.ja: 牛でも入れるどこが怪物より上等？ 見たいか？

translation.en: Of course. I'm waiting.
Come here, come here a moment.
translation.ja: 近づいて ほら もっと近くへ

translation.en: Come closer.
Look at them.
Look at your sisters.
-Armed and ready. -You're not looking.
translation.ja: 臨戦態勢ね 振り返れ

translation.en: I don't need to.
One of them. That's all I need.
translation.ja: たった一人でいいんだ

translation.en: If just one of your pretty little army beckons me in,
translation.ja: 一人でも私を招き入れれば…

translation.en: I will tear your world to pieces, and I will drink my fill.
translation.ja: 私は君を切り裂き血を飲み干す

translation.en: Why would they invite you in? What do you have to offer?
translation.ja: 誰が何のために招くの？

translation.en: -Eternal life. -Well, they have that already.
translation.ja: 永遠の命を与える 私たちは既に持ってる

translation.en: Starting tonight, because the first one to invite me in stays at my side.
translation.ja: 私を招き入れた者は守ってあげよう

translation.en: The others, I will tear apart, and, ladies,
translation.ja: 他は一人残らず殺す ああ 修道女たちよ

translation.en: I will take my time.
translation.ja: 私は ゆっくり待とう

translation.en: One should never rush a nun.
translation.ja: 修道女は急(せ)かすべきでない

translation.en: Your words are not welcome here.
Well, if you find you're not tempted by my offer,
translation.ja: 誘いに心が動かされない者は

translation.en: ask yourself this:
who is?
Who's weakest?
Who's the most afraid? Who will break first?
translation.ja: 最も臆病な者は？抜け駆けするのは？

translation.en: Is there still time for it to be you?
What's that? What are you doing?
translation.ja: それは？ 何する気だ？

translation.en: You wanted to know who's weakest.
I'm showing you.
Oh, go on, help yourself.
There's a dog comes past here most days. We often give it scraps.
translation.ja: ここに来る犬にはよく残飯をあげてる

translation.en: Go on. You've come so far.
translation.ja: 遠路はるばる来た客には―

translation.en: I'm sure you could do with a drink.
See, I'm not certain I see the appeal... of blood.
translation.ja: 私はおいしいと思わないけど

translation.en: [Agatha] Each to his own I suppose.
translation.ja: 好みは それぞれね

translation.en: Do you think provoking me is clever?
translation.ja: 挑発するのが正しい判断だと思うか？

translation.en: Yes, I do.
I want to learn about you.
I want to see the limit of your capability.
translation.ja: あなたの能力の限界を

translation.en: -It's the point of this experiment. -You have no conception,
translation.ja: 実験してるの 君は何も分かってない私は…

translation.en: not the first idea...
translation.ja: 君は何も分かってない私は…

translation.en: Here, boy.
This is contemptible.
-You are without shame. -Be careful what you say to me.
translation.ja: 恥知らずね 口の利き方に気をつけろ

translation.en: Don't speak with your mouth full.
translation.ja: 食べながら話さないで

translation.en: She has earned the right to express her contempt, you know? We all have.
translation.ja: 私たちは あなたを軽蔑する

translation.en: Each of these women in front of you has turned her back on earthly pleasures, resisting all forms of temptation.
translation.ja: 私たち修道女はあらゆる誘惑に背を向けた

translation.en: We have freed ourselves of appetite and, therefore, of fear.
translation.ja: 欲望を捨てたから恐怖から解放された

translation.en: That is why you can't bear the sight of this.
translation.ja: それが十字架を恐れる理由ね

translation.en: It speaks of the holy virtue you do not possess. It is goodness incarnate.
translation.ja: 恐怖に屈しない聖なる心の象徴だから

translation.en: For a moment there, I thought you were clever.
But no. No, that's not why I fear the cross.
translation.ja: 残念だ そんな理由ではない

translation.en: Goodness has got nothing to do with it.
translation.ja: 聖なる心など無関係だ

translation.en: [Agatha] So you say.
But how can a mere beast understand its own fear?
translation.ja: 怪物に自分の心は理解できない

translation.en: No one will invite you in, Count Dracula.
translation.ja: 誰も あなたを招かない

translation.en: We'll just pity you right where you are.
Who are you?
[Agatha] Finish your scraps. It's all you'll be getting tonight.
translation.ja: 残さず食べてそれきりだから

translation.en: Agatha.
That's your name, isn't it?
Mother Superior used my name. You heard her.
translation.ja: 誰かが呼ぶのを聞いたのねだまされない

translation.en: -You'll have to do better than that. -You're from somewhere else, I think.
translation.ja: 誰かが呼ぶのを聞いたのねだまされない ハンガリーの出身ではない

translation.en: Um...
translation.ja: ハンガリーの出身ではない

translation.en: Holland, right?
Well, you can tell as much from my accent, I think. I bid you good night.
translation.ja: 私の言葉はなまってるからね おやすみ

translation.en: [Dracula shouts] Helsing!
Van Helsing!
What is your interest in me, Agatha Van Helsing?
translation.ja: なぜ私に興味を持つ？アガサ･ヴァン･ヘルシング

translation.en: Who are you?
Your every nightmare at once.
translation.ja: 私は あなたの悪夢

translation.en: An educated woman in a crucifix.
[Agatha] He was a brave man.
He must have loved you very much.
translation.ja: あなたへの愛がゆえね

translation.en: What is he?
What is Count Dracula?
translation.ja: ドラキュラは何者なの？

translation.en: In life, he was a prince of exceptional learning and attainment.
translation.ja: 生前は才能あふれる貴公子

translation.en: In death, I suppose you could say he's the best of the vampires.
-The best? -The most successful, I mean.
translation.ja: 最高？ 最も強いということ普通は理性を失う

translation.en: Most are feral, half-mad.
translation.ja: 最も強いということ普通は理性を失う

translation.en: They rarely last long, and yet, somehow,
translation.ja: そして すぐ滅びる

translation.en: Dracula has found a way to retain his human form and intellect, more or less intact, for hundreds of years.
translation.ja: ドラキュラは数百年理性を保って存在してる

translation.en: -By drinking blood. -[Agatha] Ah, they all drink blood.
translation.ja: 吸血のおかげ？ どの吸血鬼も血は吸うやり方の問題ね

translation.en: Dracula has learned to do it well.
translation.ja: どの吸血鬼も血は吸うやり方の問題ね

translation.en: I think, by choosing his victims with the greatest of care.
translation.ja: 獲物を厳選したからかも

translation.en: Even in death, he has retained the discrimination of an aristocrat.
translation.ja: 死してなお貴族趣味を保った

translation.en: And so, he took my Johnny.
[Agatha] Come, the Mother Superior will want to lead us in prayer.
translation.ja: 祈りの時間よ　行きましょう

translation.en: [Mina] I don't see the point in praying.
God is nowhere.
In which case, it is up to us to stop Count Dracula.
translation.ja: ならば私たちがドラキュラを倒さないと

translation.en: And we will, won't we?
Yes, we will.
[Mina] Goodbye, Johnny Blue Eyes.
translation.ja: 私の青い目のジョニー

translation.en: I shan't ever love anyone else, you know.
translation.ja: 私は もう誰も愛さない

translation.en: Quite right.
[Dracula whispering] Johnny.
Johnny Blue Eyes.
Suicide doesn't work. Don't you think the undead have tried that?
translation.ja: どの不死者も試すが自殺は無駄だ

translation.en: [Dracula] Stake through the heart, that's fine,
translation.ja: 心臓に杭は効果があるが―

translation.en: but someone else needs to put it there.
translation.ja: 誰かに刺してもらわないと

translation.en: I'm willing to give it a try.
Do you want me to do that?
Do you want me to kill you properly?
All you have to do...
is invite me in.
[Mother Superior] We face danger. We face evil,
translation.ja: 我らは邪悪に対面した

translation.en: which stands at the gate of our most holy sanctuary.
translation.ja: 邪悪は聖域の門前に立った

translation.en: God is with us, as we know.
translation.ja: 神は我らとともにある

translation.en: God's love is eternal.
This we know, too.
Tonight, in our most deadly hour,
do we think our God will remember us?
Will he reach down and save us from death's shadow?
translation.ja: 神は降臨し我らを闇から救うか？

translation.en: No.
No, he will not.
Where in our world is God to be found?
translation.ja: 神は どこで見つかるのか？

translation.en: In our prayer?
No.
In our song?
No.
In our suffering? In our endurance?
No.
Faith is not a transaction.
You do not barter with the infinite. You align with it.
translation.ja: 神と取引などできない神には従うのみ

translation.en: So then, where do we find our God?
Sisters, I will tell you.
When you stand in the deepest pit,
translation.ja: 最も深い穴の底にいて―

translation.en: alone, without hope or help, and yet still know right from wrong.
translation.ja: 希望も救いもなくても善悪の判断を間違えぬ時

translation.en: When there is only darkness and despair,
translation.ja: 闇と絶望しか なくとも―

translation.en: and yet you feel humming in your blood, the difference between good and bad.
translation.ja: 自らの血潮の中に聖歌と正義を感じられる時

translation.en: When you are beyond rescue, or reward, or judgment,
translation.ja: 救いも報酬もなくとも―

translation.en: and you still look evil in the face and say,
translation.ja: 邪悪に敢然と立ち向かえる時

translation.en: "No. This far, but no further.
translation.ja: “これ以上は許さない”と悪に言い放てる時

translation.en: No!"
Whose voice is that?
Who's with you in that darkness?
translation.ja: 闇の中で隣にいたのは？

translation.en: Whose voice keeps you to the path?
translation.ja: 誰の声が あなたを導いた？

translation.en: Darkness and evil may seem compelling to us all,
translation.ja: 闇と悪が強大に見えるのは―

translation.en: and I believe it is because in their presence, we can feel God in our hearts.
translation.ja: それらと対面する時に神の力を感じられるから

translation.en: No, he will not reach down to save us.
translation.ja: 神は我らを救いには来ない

translation.en: We will rise to meet him.
translation.ja: 私たちが神に近づきに行く

translation.en: Let us pray.
She was clearing her throat.
I think it's fine now.
So, ladies, who's next?
It's just that I have a very hard time deciding who's gonna be--
translation.ja: 次は誰にするか迷ってしまうな

translation.en: Here's an idea.
Catch.
This will be the safest spot.
-[Mina] What is this place? -My workshop.
Here, where the sunlight hits.
-It's nighttime. -In the morning.
translation.ja: 夜よ？ 朝日が差す所よ

translation.en: [Mina] It's not morning for hours.
[Agatha] I know.
[Dracula] Who's got it? Who's caught it?
Ah, we have a winner!
-What's that? -Jesus.
Jesus?
[Agatha] Bread.
Sacramental bread.
Oh, of course.
Nuns. You have those things which work, actually,
translation.ja: 修道女なら十字架を持っている

translation.en: even though you will...
never guess why.
translation.ja: 理解できないだろうがね

translation.en: So I suppose I'll just have to control myself,
translation.ja: 私は遊ぶのを諦めよう

translation.en: but between you and me,
controlling wolves is just so much more fun.
translation.ja: 代わりに狼(おおかみ)に遊ばせる

translation.en: It's a question of who you'd rather have tear you apart, I suppose.
translation.ja: どっちに引き裂かれるのがマシかな？

translation.en: You have a choice, of course. I'm undead, I'm not unreasonable.
translation.ja: 好きな方を選べ私は不死だが不寛容ではない

translation.en: Oh! Ow, that must have hurt.
It's all right. The screaming has stopped.
I don't know how you could bear to listen to that.
translation.ja: なぜ聞いていられるの？

translation.en: I brought it on them. Listening was my punishment. [sniffles]
translation.ja: 私が呼び寄せた罰として聞いてる

translation.en: Dracula's going to find us, isn't he?
translation.ja: 伯爵は ここにも来る

translation.en: [Agatha] Of course.
How is bread going to keep him out?
-Sacramental bread. -[Mina] But how?
I don't know. None of the vampire legends make sense, and yet, somehow, they are proving to be true.
translation.ja: 他の吸血鬼対策だって意味不明だけど効いてる

translation.en: He can't enter a home without being invited. Why not?
translation.ja: 招かれない家には入れない

translation.en: The light of the day would burn him to death.
Why?
He's terrified of the cross, and yet he's no believer.
translation.ja: 信じてないのに十字架を恐れる

translation.en: Somehow, these facts are all the same fact.
translation.ja: 説明がつかなくても効果がある

translation.en: There's one thing that Dracula fears above all.
translation.ja: 彼が最も恐れるものがある

translation.en: And to destroy him, we must discover it.
translation.ja: 私たちがそれを見つけないと

translation.en: He got into the convent. How did he get in here?
translation.ja: なぜ修道院に入(はい)れたの？

translation.en: Well, clearly, there was an invitation.
Then someone invited him.
translation.ja: 一体 誰が招いたの？

translation.en: [Harker] Mina?
[Mina shakily] I thought you were...
translation.ja: ジョニー あなたは…

translation.en: I saw you dead.
I couldn't stop him, Mina. I let him inside.
translation.ja: 僕が伯爵を招いてしまった

translation.en: -He's inside. -We know, Johnny.
translation.ja: 伯爵が中に 知ってる

translation.en: He killed everyone.
Do not cross that line. You can't come any closer.
translation.ja: その線を決して越えないで

translation.en: [Mina] Let him in.
We cannot trust him.
He is strong, stronger than you think.
-And if I'm with him-- -[Agatha] No one is strong enough.
translation.ja: ジョニーは強い人よ 強さの問題ではない

translation.en: -No one. -Please!
-We can't just leave him out there. -Do not invite him in.
translation.ja: 入れないと彼は死ぬ！ 彼を招き入れないで

translation.en: No!
Come here, Johnny.
Come to me.
I... am inviting you to be with me.
translation.ja: 私はあなたを私の元へ招き入れる

translation.en: You don't know what you're doing. He let Dracula in. He will do it again!
translation.ja: 彼は伯爵を招いた危険すぎる

translation.en: [Mina] He won't. Will you, Johnny?
translation.ja: 大丈夫よね ジョニー

translation.en: 'Cause I'm here with you,
and I will give you strength. The two of us, together, we can be stronger.
translation.ja: ２人でいれば私たちは何にも負けない

translation.en: Johnny, your eyes...
He's inside.
Why aren't your eyes blue anymore?
[whispering] They're not my eyes.
translation.ja: ジョニーの目ではないからさ

translation.en: Hello.
I've been dying to meet you.
translation.ja: 死ぬほど会いたかった
